marklogic.body: Congress didn't read the stinking piece of trash BEFORE THEY PASSED IT ! PELOSI quivered as she said that WE HAVE TO PASS IT TO KNOW WHAT'S IN IT. Now, they want them to re-read this crap for a year and go line item by line item and yeah and nay each provision??? SCALIA is the only one with a "SET" to tell them all Off ! BURN THE DARN LAW, AND LET US DANCE ON ITS ASHES! THEN CHARGE EVERY DIRTBAG CONGRESSMAN WHO PASSED IT WITH TREASON! Confiscate all their property and give it all back to the people. Obama goes down first!
